Description:
As a leader in consumer intelligence company, NIQ is one of the most trusted sources of BI for the world's top brands. The work we do makes a significant difference to how businesses and brands perform in markets around the world. At NIQ we all share a commitment to our core values of being simple, open and integrated in how we work — with each other, our partners, and our clients.   We are looking for experienced and passionate people to join our team in Chennai.  SIMPLY PUT:  This position is responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of a team (10 direct reports), ensuring that tasks are completed efficiently and effectively. You will also be responsible for setting goals, leading team meetings, and providing support and guidance to team members.  A Team Leader also acts as a liaison between the team and upper management, providing regular updates on progress and identifying areas for improvement.  CHALLENGES THAT AWAIT YOU: Plan, monitor and manage the team’s work  Facilitate the team focus on the on-time delivery of agreed deliverables 

Encourage full participation of team members within their defined roles and responsibilities 

Ensure that the delivery process is properly focused and controlled 

Identify and advise the manager on any issues and risks associated with a work package.  

Support the implementation of new services & platforms  Partner with all RDDS teams and beyond to ensure SLAs, set expectations, and deliver client-specific KPIs (as required)   

Partner with larger teams to contribute to the development and further improvement of internal and external KPIs through process standard improvement as well as work on production incidents and other areas for root cause identification and improvement plan development 

Support dedicated team in day-to-day requests and escalations  

Support UAT and upgrade efforts via test planning, validation of staffing and status YOUR PROFILE: Previous supervisory experience required 

Ability to motivate staff and maintain a high enthusiasm among employees within the center 

Knowledge of employee training and its practices. Ability to recognize high performance and reward accomplishments.  

Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications. 

Demonstrated communication skills, both verbal and written 

Effective problem solving 

Ability and willingness to learn and drive improvement  Ability to work across multiple stakeholders and functions in the matrixed organizational structure 

Knowledge of NIQ products, and other GBS functions (preferred) OPPORTUNITY TO GROW:  At NIQ you will experience a dynamic, open, and solution-oriented international environment, where we support your development through a trust-based feedback culture and diverse training possibilities.  As part of our culture, our promise to you is that at Nielsen you can: Be Yourself, Make a Difference and grow with Us.   RDDS Overview Nielsen Retail Direct Data Solution (RDDS) provides software, data content, analytics, and consulting designed to efficiently extract insights from daily-store-item level and related data, creating actionable information that enables manufacturers to execute more effectively at retail. JOIN OUR TEAM AT NIQ!  As part of our culture, our promise to you is that at Nielsen you can: Be Yourself, Make a Difference and grow with Us.  About NIQNIQ is the world’s leading consumer intelligence company, delivering the most complete understanding of consumer buying behavior and revealing new pathways to growth. In 2023, NIQ combined with GfK, bringing together the two industry leaders with unparalleled global reach. With a holistic retail read and the most comprehensive consumer insights—delivered with advanced analytics through state-of-the-art platforms—NIQ delivers the Full View™.NIQ, is an Advent International portfolio company with operations in 100+ markets, covering more than 90% of the world’s population.
